scheduler.name: scx_chaos
scheduler.description: A chaos testing scheduler based on scx_p2dq that introduces controlled randomness to stress test scheduling behavior and identify race conditions. Designed to amplify race conditions and test system stability under adverse scheduling conditions.
scheduler.characteristics: chaos injection, random delays, performance degradation, cpu frequency manipulation, kprobe-based delays

random_delay_frequency.description: Chance of randomly delaying a process

random_delay_min_us.description: Minimum time to add for random delay

random_delay_max_us.description: Maximum time to add for random delay

scheduler.limitations: Not production ready, intentionally unpredictable performance
scheduler.performance_profile: designed for stress testing, not performance
